items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. items.content_html: The Reflection Application is a lightweight project built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to register, log in, and generate unique feedback links. Participants can submit anonymous feedback without logging in, and users can view all responses on a dashboard. Data is stored locally using browser LocalStorage.
items.title: Vaishnavibhadange/Reflection_Application: The Reflection Application is a lightweight project built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to register, log in, and generate unique feedback links. Participants can submit anonymous feedback without logging in, and users can view all responses on a dashboard. Data is stored locally using browser LocalStorage.
